pull.title: [Trivial] Update license year range to 2019
pull.body:
Bitcoin Core is going to become 10 so the license year range also needs an update.
2019 is coming very soon so it is the time to update the year range like every year.

Same as #12063

events.body:
See #12063.

BTW, maybe there could be a script to generate a scripted diff?
@Empact Should I also update the copyright headers with 2019 and squash the commits then ?
@emilengler just update this to include the same files as #12063. i.e add `configure.ac` & `contrib/debian/copyright`, then squash into a single commit.

events.message:
[Trivial] Update license year range to 2019

Update year range
